sentence_zh_TW: 在正式會議上，穿著合適的襯衫顯得格外重要，以給人留下良好的第一印象。
sentence: Wearing the right ______ is particularly important at formal meetings to make a good first impression.

sentence_zh_TW: 每當我感到無聊時，我就喜歡躺在沙發上看一本好書，讓自己沉浸在故事中。
sentence: Whenever I feel bored, I love to lie on the sofa and read a good ______, immersing myself in the story.

sentence_zh_TW: 當我在公園裡散步時，突然出現的彩虹讓我驚艷不已，彷彿在天空中畫出了一道美麗的弧線。
sentence: While walking in the park, the sudden appearance of a ______ amazed me, as if it painted a beautiful arc in the sky.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個遊戲中，玩家需要得到七個分數才能獲得獎勵，這使得比賽變得更加刺激。
sentence: In this game, players need to score ______ points to earn rewards, making the competition even more exciting.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們計劃這個周末去一個離家很遠的地方度假，期待著一段放鬆的時光。
sentence: We plan to go to a place far ______ from home for a vacation this weekend, looking forward to some relaxing time.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們全家都打算在這個周末為我的生日舉辦一個派對來慶祝，這是我們一年中最期待的時刻。
sentence: My whole family plans to throw a party this weekend to ______ my birthday, which is the most anticipated moment of the year.

sentence_zh_TW: 在上課時，老師鼓勵學生在課本上寫下便條，以加深對資料的理解。
sentence: During class, the teacher encourages students to write ______ in their textbooks to deepen their understanding of the material.

sentence_zh_TW: 保持良好的健康對於過上幸福的生活至關重要。
sentence: Maintaining good ______ is essential for leading a happy life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個競賽中，你需要跟隨比賽的規則才能獲得好成績。
sentence: In this competition, you need to ______ the rules to achieve good results.

sentence_zh_TW: 網球是一項受到全球廣泛喜愛的運動，特別是在夏季時。
sentence: ______ is a sport that is widely loved around the world, especially during summer.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這段關係中，溝通是建立信任和理解的重要橋樑，讓彼此的想法不再隱藏在之間。
sentence: In this relationship, communication is an important bridge that builds trust and understanding, preventing thoughts from hiding ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 在教室的前面，老師正在專注地講解重要的課題。
sentence: At the ______ of the classroom, the teacher is focusing on explaining important topics.

sentence_zh_TW: 每年秋天，樹葉的色彩會變得絢麗多彩，成為攝影師的天堂。
sentence: Every year in ______, the colors of the leaves become vibrant, turning into a paradise for photographers.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你沒有找到理想的工作，不妨嘗試另一個行業，這樣可能會有新的機會出現。
sentence: If you haven’t found your ideal job, it might be worth trying ______ industry, as new opportunities may arise.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個菜譜中，為了增加風味，你需要添加一些新鮮草 herbs 和香料。
sentence: In this recipe, to enhance the flavor, you need to ______ some fresh herbs and spices.

sentence_zh_TW: 這隻玩具熊是我的最愛，每次看到它，我都會想起許多美好的回憶。
sentence: This teddy bear is ______ favorite; every time I see it, I remember many wonderful memories.

sentence_zh_TW: 這條河流是當地生態系統的重要組成部分，為許多植物和動物提供生存環境。
sentence: This ______ is an essential part of the local ecosystem, providing a habitat for many plants and animals.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個乾燥的氣候中，務必要保持水分，以免身體失去平衡。
sentence: In this ______ climate, it is crucial to stay hydrated to avoid losing bodily balance.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個美麗的城鎮裡，居民們享受著和諧的生活，並積極參與各種社區活動。
sentence: In this beautiful ______, the residents enjoy a harmonious life and actively participate in various community activities.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了確保圖片的正確性，請使用一把直的尺來畫線。
sentence: To ensure the accuracy of the drawing, please use a ______ ruler to draw the line.
